content.en: Autism diagnosis algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve the diagnosis of autism spectrum disorders. These algorithms, such as the Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised and Autism Diagnostic Observation Schedule, combine information from multiple sources to enhance accuracy. The revised ADOS algorithm has also been found to be effective in diagnosing autism spectrum disorders in Hispanic children.
content.da: Algoritmer til autisme-diagnose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer for at forbedre diagnosen af autismespektrumforstyrrelser. Disse algoritmer, såsom Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised og Autism Diagnostic Observation Schedule, kombinerer information fra flere kilder for at øge nøjagtigheden. Det reviderede ADOS-algoritme er også blevet fundet effektiv i diagnosen af autismespektrumforstyrrelser hos hispaniske børn.
